mapper.sql: id, areacode, price, power, payment, remark, status, createDate
mapper.insert: insert into ammeter_area (id, areacode, price, power, payment, remark, status, createDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{power,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ammeter_area set areacode = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, power = #{power,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.areacode, t.price, t.power, t.payment, t.remark, t.status, t.createDate, s.name as areaName from ammeter_area t LEFT JOIN top_subarea s on s.code = t.areacode where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
